data.title: Racing: Fallon why I had to move
data.meta_description: But they had both seen this coming, or at least thought they had. When Fallon was home on a short break from riding in America earlier in the month, he had called round to talk with Stoute. Nothing
data.text:
But they had both seen this coming, or at least thought they had. When Fallon was home on a short break from riding in America earlier in the month, he had called round to talk with Stoute. Nothing was said but everything was understood. Once Jamie Spencer gave up his job as Coolmore’s retained rider, Stoute knew they would come looking for his man.

But though they like each other and have enjoyed a wonderfully successful five years together, Stoute and Fallon are both private men who prefer to leave much unsaid. The trainer didn’t ask if his jockey had been approached. Nor did Fallon tell him Michael Tabor had spoken to him and hinted that the job could be his.

For Fallon it was
